Package hotelproject.controllers.db

Class CustomersDB

java.lang.Object
hotelproject.controllers.db.CustomersDB
public class CustomersDB
extends java.lang.Object
This class is used for manipulating all the SQL operations related to customers.

    • CustomersDB

      public CustomersDB​(java.sql.Connection conn)

  • Method Details

    • customerExists

      public boolean customerExists​(Customer customer)
      Identify if the customer already exists in the database.This method will be used by addCustomer() method.
      Parameters:
      customer - The customer for checking.
      Returns:
      If customer's social security number already exists will return true, otherwise return false.

    • addCustomer

      public void addCustomer​(Customer customer)
      Add a new customer if the social security number is not duplicated.
      Parameters:
      customer - The inserted customer object.

    • updateCustomer

      public void updateCustomer​(Customer customer, int oldCustomerSSNumber)
      Update customer in the database.
      Parameters:
      customer - The updated Customer object.
      oldCustomerSSNumber - The old customer's social security number that is to be updated.

    • deleteCustomer

      public void deleteCustomer​(Customer customer)
      Delete the customer from database.
      Parameters:
      customer - The customer object for delete.

    • findAllCustomers

      public java.util.ArrayList<Customer> findAllCustomers()
      Search all current customers and return as ArrayList
      Returns:
      list filled with all Customer objects collected from the database

    • getCustomerName

      public java.lang.String getCustomerName​(java.lang.Integer c_ss_number)
